entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Prismatic Bolt

components.m: a clear prism of any sort, such as a crystal

entries: A shimmering bolt of light streaks from the prism. The bolt's color changes rapidly as it flies through the air. Make a ranged spell attack against a creature you can see within range. On a hit, roll {@dice 1d8} on the chart below to see which effect occurs. If the effect deals damage, then its dice are doubled if your attack was a critical hit.
1. Red- The target takes {@damage 1d8} fire damage.
2. Orange- The target takes {@damage 1d8} acid damage.
3. Yellow- The target takes {@damage 1d8} lightning damage.
4. Green- The target takes {@damage 1d8} poison damage.
5. Blue- The target takes {@damage 1d8} cold damage

6. Indigo- Until the end of their next turn, the target's first attack is made at disadvantage and their movement speed is reduced by 10 feet. Additional applications of this effect further reduce the target's movement speed by 10 feet per application.

7. Violet- Until the end of their next turn or until they take damage, whichever happens first, the target cannot see more than 20 feet away. Additional applications of this effect can reduce the distance the target can see by 5 feet per application. Damage from this cantrip does not break the effect.
8. Special- Choose the effect you'd like to occur.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: You increase the number of dice you roll on the chart to determine effects by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d8}), 11th level ({@dice 3d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d8}). All effects apply to the target on a hit.

spell.name: Pocketswap
entries: You swap the insides of two pockets you touch by teleporting their contents. Make a sleight of hand check, using your spellcasting ability modifier instead of dexterity against a target's passive perception. On a successful check, you swap the pockets' contents, and a target is unaware. On a failed check, both pockets contents teleport into the open space between you, fall onto the ground and make a target aware.

spell.name: Arc Blade
entries: As part of the action used to cast this spell, you must make a melee attack with a weapon against one creature within the spell’s range, otherwise the spell fails. On a hit, the attack does damage as normal, except that the entire attack deals lightning damage instead of its normal type. Additionally, an arc of lightning jumps to a creature you choose within 5 feet of the target, dealing {@damage 1d6} lightning damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: At 5th level, the melee attack deals an additional {@damage 1d8} lightning damage and secondary damage deals an additional {@damage 1d6} lightning damage to their targets. Both damage rolls increase by one die at 11th level ({@dice 2d8 / 3d6}), and 17th level ({@dice 3d8 / 4d6}).

spell.name: Caustic Blade
entries: As part of the action used to cast this spell, you must make a melee attack with a weapon against one creature within the spell’s range, otherwise the spell fails. On a hit, the attack does damage as normal, except that the entire attack deals acid damage instead of its normal type. If you miss by 3 or less, acid splashes on the target, and you instead deal {@damage 1d8} acid damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: At 5th level, the melee attack deals an additional {@damage 1d8} acid damage, and the damage the spell deals on a miss also deals an additional {@damage 1d8} acid damage. Both damage rolls increase by one die at 11th level ({@dice 2d8 / 3d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 3d8 / 4d8}).

spell.name: Force Buckler

m.text: a specially-prepared gauntlet worth at least 5 gp

entries: You summon a translucent, yet visible, field of force which springs forth from the prepared gauntlet. Until the beginning of your next turn, this shield grants you a +2 bonus to your Armor Class, as if you were wielding a shield. This spell ends early if you are hit by an attack.

spell.name: Force Dart

m.text: a specially-prepared gauntlet worth at least 5 gp

entries: You fling a dart of magical force at a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d10} force damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d10} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d10}), 11th level ({@dice 3d10}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d10}).

spell.name: Force Weapon

m.text: a specially-prepared gauntlet worth at least 5 gp

entries: You conjure a blade of magical force in the air, which lashes out at your foes. Make a melee spell attack. On a hit, you deal {@damage 1d10} force damage. The blade remains in existence for a short time; until the beginning of your next turn, you can make a single strike with your mystical blade as an opportunity attack.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: You can make 1 additional attack on your turn at 5th level (2 attacks), at 11th level (3 attacks), and at 17th level (4 attacks).

spell.name: Frigid Blade
entries: As part of the action used to cast this spell, you must make a melee attack with a weapon against one creature within the spell’s range, otherwise the spell fails. On a hit, the attack does damage as normal, except that the entire attack deals cold damage instead of its normal type.

Additionally, the target is covered in a brittle frost until the start of your next turn. If the target willingly moves before then, you can use your reaction to deal {@damage 1d8} cold damage to the target, ending the spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: At 5th level, the melee attack and secondary damage each deal an additional {@damage 1d8} cold damage. Both damage rolls increase by {@dice 1d8} at 11th level ({@dice 2d8 / 3d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 3d8 / 4d8}).

spell.name: Magic daggers
entries: With a flourish, you conjure a throwing dagger of magical force out of thin air and flick it from your wrist at a target you can see. Make a ranged spell attack roll against a creature within range. On a hit, the target takes {@dice 1d6} magical piercing damage. The dagger vanishes after the attack.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: At higher levels, you conjure more daggers out of force and make additional attacks: two daggers at 5th level, three daggers at 11th level, and four daggers at 17th level. You can use the daggers to attack the same target or different ones. Make a separate attack roll for each dagger.

spell.name: Phantom Grapnel
entries: You conjure a chain and hook made of magical force, which you propel at a creature or unoccupied space you can see within range. When you target a space or a creature of Huge size or larger, your grapnel pulls you to that target in a straight line. You provoke opportunity attacks for this movement as normal. When you target a creature of Large size or smaller, you pull the target up to 10 feet towards you. A creature can make a Strength saving throw to resist this movement.

spell.name: Quickstep
entries: You call upon your inner reserves to give you a brief flash of speed. When you cast this spell, your base movement speed increases by 10 feet until the beginning of your next turn.

spell.name: Sonic Pulse
entries: You compress a thunderous boom into an {@condition invisible} ball and project it at a creature you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d8} thunder damage and is {@condition deafened} until the start of your next turn. If the spell’s target is within 10 feet of you, this spell’s damage becomes {@dice d10}s, instead of {@dice d8}s.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: This spell’s damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d8}), 11th level ({@dice 3d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d8}).

spell.name: Springheel
entries: You flood magic into your legs, allowing you to bound high into the air from a standstill. When you cast this spell, your jump distance increases 10 feet until the beginning of your next turn, and you can make a running high jump or a running long jump without a running start.

spell.name: Thunderous Distortion
entries: You produce a distorted wave of noise in a 10-foot cone, which can be heard up to 100 feet away. Each creature in that area must succeed a Constitution saving throw, or take {@damage 1d6} thunder damage. An echo of this noise persists until the end of your next turn. If you cast this spell again before the end of your next turn, its damage becomes {@dice d8}s, instead of {@dice d6}s.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: This spell’s damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d6}), 11th level ({@dice 3d6}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).
